title: Council Decision of 8 December 1995 appointing a member and two alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 8 December 1995 appointing a member and two alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners (95/C 343/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Dr Gabriel OSTREICHER is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Dr Eugène SAINT-ÈVE for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Dr Eugène SAINT-ÈVE is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Mr Jacques MONNOT for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Dr Leif LEISNERT is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Professor Goeran ANNEROTH for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
J. BORRELL FONTELLES
(1) OJ No L 233, 24. 8. 1978, p. 15.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 5.
(3) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 1.
